question: If you look at my posts you'll see I have been searching for a year now. Only results are more questions.My son recently took another blood test ..before returning for a visit with nephrologist.  It show protien in urine again...now carbon dioxide flagged high.32 range is 22-29 mEq/L   Also his spot Urine Creatine says >300...which I think means high but I DONT KNOW.  Spot urine protien is 16.mg/dl his BUN is 14 range 7-18 mg/dl   I am not sure if this has been tested before so not sure if it has gone up.We had an ultra sound and it showed something below the kidney. We then had a CAT scan which they said was clear.  My son is having intermittent pain in his right kidney which is the suspicious one.  He has had very low WBC and RBC for over a year.  The last visit to the hemotologist was the same...but the call i received when I got home was his glucose was at 46.  I asked if i should watch they said no.  I asked if he should have specific testing for diabetes they said no.  SO....we have the appt at nephrologist next Monday..CAN ANYONE GIVE ME SOME INSIGHT ON THESE READINGS???Thanks (he is 18)
title: could this be diabetes? or kidney problems alone
